channel.title: Post bans with reasons here!
channel.description:
The older topic was getting a mess, so I've taken it down and stuck this. The topics point is still the same expect with a different format, instead of multiple pages of unrelated posts and scattered ban logging in this topic you could make 1 post per moderator and continually edit that post as you add more bans.
This makes it a lot easier to handle. Thanks. A suggested format is:
Name: Moparisthebest, reason: speedhacking, time: 3 days, date: 6/6/1666, othernotes: n/a
and so on, feel free to use bold etc if you care how it looks ;D Once a ban has expired cross it out, and remove the banned user from the ban function on the forums.
(PS I have gone through the ban list and unbanned those who are over due, or who are felt deserve another chance, myself and Zuppers did this on the IRC).
I'll start:
[s]Name: MeepJ Reason: Community harassment/griefing time:2hours date: 02/07/2012[/s]
alireda132 - Griefing - 5 days - 16/07/2012 Gamjawoz - Griefing - 2 weeks - 16/07/2012 big_n12 - Grieing - 2 days - 16/07/2012 Fristinator - Killing animals - 1 week - 16/07/2012 MeepJ - Griefing - 4 days - 07/08/2012 xxslenderxx - Grieifing (one two accounts, his other account was lukemorais) - 1 week - 18/08/2012

item.title: Post bans with reasons here!
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

User: E_F_F (eliasFF)
Duration: 2 months
Reason: After being warned about grief from the day before, he continued to grief multiple things.
Note: Hes been banned before by fuscate

User: minecraftmj132
Duration: 2 months
Reason: Greifed teresa’s spleef arena
Note: Has been banned before for griefing

User: KrisMa
Duration: 3 weeks
Reason: Greifing around spawn
Note: I warned him about greifing previously

User: thaArab
Duration: 3 days
Reason: Greifing
Note: (12th)

User: Thecrazymat
Duration: A long time
Reason: Major greifing
Note:

item.description:

[ol][li]Name: Kaeyos, Time: A long time until he contacts staff., Reason: Reports of xray and seen him flying on worldmap, Notes: Told I need to check his chest.[/li]

item.title: Post bans with reasons here!
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

Banned: werepig7
Time: Two days
Reason: Grief
Notes: _

Banned: vDubstepHD
Time: Two months
Reason: Grief
Notes: Extended ban because he boasted about the things he destroyed.

Banned: jnewbykbc
Time: One week
Reason: Multiple grief reports
Notes: _

Banned: Tiny_BTG
Time: Four weeks
Reason: Intentional grief
Notes: _

When: 18/07/12
Time: 2 months
Reason: Server wide grief
Notes: _

When: 21/07/12
Time: Two weeks
Reason: Grief
Notes: _

Banned: jnewbykbc
When: 21/07/12
Time: Three weeks
Reason: Grief
Notes: Day after he is unbanned he griefs again, amazing.

Banned: sylvandropkilla
When: 21/07/12
Time: Three months minimum
Reason: Grief
Notes: Ignored me while I watched him grief consistently, rollback within a 300 radius showed he broke 1257 blocks

Muted: elmo2323
When: 23/07/12
Time: Two days
Reason: Excessive spam, cursing at other players and filling the chat with unnecessary caps locks.
Notes: I warned him multiple times about grief but because it was on his first day I let it slide. He said something along the lines of ‘fuck the rules’ so if there is any griefing from him i’ll ban him for a considerable amount of time.

New list

Name: elmo2323/tradegy

Notes: If i catch him again it will be two months
